data.title: Solved: Re: automatically remove Constant Contact logo onc...
data.meta_description: I hope someone can contact me asap to help remove the logo and link from my emails asap please Kind Regards Paora Winitana New customer - 210748 - 43
data.text:
Hey @GislaineD!

Thanks for reaching out to the Community! This help article goes over how we can remove the Constant Contact logo from the footer of the email campaigns as long as you have an active paid account. Because you already requested to have this removed, I did go ahead and remove the Constant Contact logo from your account. So any existing or future campaigns should no longer have that logo within the footer. Let us know if you have any further questions!

Jessica H.

Community Support

If you find my post helpful, and it answers your question, please mark it as an "Accepted Solution" by clicking the Accept as Solution button in the bottom right hand corner of this post.

Increase your profitability by integrating your email marketing and social media. Download this guide and learn how you can achieve great results with email marketing and social media combined!

OMG, you guys make it incredibly difficult to send an email to the support team. This is the only place I could find to make my request to remove your logo from my campaigns, it is absurd that I can not do this for myself. I pay for my service and I am appalled that I have to have you remove YOUR LOGO.

Furthermore... I like to handle things in the moment I realize I need to do them. In searching your knowledge base I discovered you have me hostage... meaning that I have to request you to remove the logo... yet you provide no support email address for me to make this request.

I am seriously considering leaving constant contact due to this absolute frustration, and waste of my valuable time.

Regards,

Karen J Lewis

Hello,

Thank you for contacting the Community! I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you, unfortunately Constant Contact does not have an email support channel.

I have removed the logo from your account, if you refresh your page or log out and log back in to your account you should see the change.

Thank you,

Mariah_P

Community & Social Media Support

If you find my post helpful, and it answers your question, please mark it as an "Accepted Solution" by clicking the Accept as Solution button in the bottom right hand corner of this post.

Hello @KatherineJ,

Thank you for reaching out to the Community. Because you are a paying customer I was able to remove the Constant Contact logo from your footer. You may need to log out of the account and log back in to see the changes. All previous and new campaigns will be updated and will no longer contain the logo at the bottom of your footer. I can understand how useful it would be to be able to manage your footer within your account, I will submit your feedback to the correct department. Please let us know if you have any further questions.

Tiago_R

Community & Social Media Support

If you find my post helpful, and it answers your question, please mark it as an "Accepted Solution" by clicking the Accept as Solution button in the bottom right hand corner of this post.

@MikeM65188

Thank you for reaching out to the Community. That is a great question! This is something that we need to remove on our end for you. I have removed the logo from your account and it should be updated within a few minutes.

In the meantime, if you have any further questions please feel free to reach out to us here. We are always happy to assist you in any way we can!

Taryn Leinweber

Community & Social Media Support

Did I answer your question? If so, please mark my post as an "Accepted Solution" by clicking the Accept as Solution button in the bottom right hand corner of this post.

Anyone can be a marketer! Visit our Blog & Resources page to brush up on the latest tips and tricks.

Hello @AdamF609,

Thank you for reaching out to the community today! Since you are a paying customer, we have the ability to remove your logo which we have done. You may need to log out and log back into your account to see this change in your drafts.

We also provide custom footer options if you would like to make the footer of your campaign your own. Starting at $99, these services are a great way to brand every campaign that you send. For more information about custom footer options click here.

Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

-Curtis P

Hi @APAARI,

Thank you for reaching out to us through the Community. Since you are a paying client, I managed to remove the Constant Contact logo from the bottom of the footer. You may have to log out and log back in to see the changes. All your templates and email campaigns should now be without the Constant Contact logo. Let me know if I can assist with anything else.

Lucas_D

Hi @First-NameL31978

Thank you for reaching out about your email! I can completely understand how helpful it would be for our Constant Contact logo to be removed as soon as you become a paid costumer. I apologize for any inconvenience from this not being our current process and have submitted your feedback on this. In the meantime, I took a look at your account and can see our Constant Contact logo has been removed. If you cannot see this change I would suggest logging out of your account and logging back in.

Frankie.P

Hi @First-NameL09354

Thank you for reaching out to the Community! I took a peek at your account and can see you were able to get in touch with our support by phone to remove this logo in your email footer. If you don't see this change in your email, I would suggest logging out then logging back in.

Frankie.P

Hi @AndrewS1898

I'm so sorry to hear this is happening with your email! I have taken a look at your most recent campaign and was unable to replicate this same experience. With that said, we would be happy to help look into this further with you. What is the name of the campaign you are seeing this happen with? Which email client are you using? What model of iPhone and version of iOS? We have seen cases where emails are not mobile responsive in the Outlook Mobile App for iPhone. If you are using the Outlook app, what version is it? In these cases we suggest viewing the email campaign in a different mobile mail client such as the native mail app or the Gmail app.

Frankie.P

Community & Social Media Support
